name: Drive or Die-V
description:
Drive or Die-V is my first ever GameJam game, as well as first finished game in general.

In Drive or Die-V, you are a blue car on a simple drive downtown, until suddenly your car starts moving randomly, you've Lost Control! To make matters worse, there are gang members (in their red cars) on the road too, though luckily you brought your gun. make sure not to hit the civilians and remember, you can't shoot and drive at the same time though, so watch out.

All textures were made by me

All sound effects were created using SFXR

Rising Tide (faster) Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
